pageContext.title: Age Verification Popup
pageContext.miniDescription: Works on any theme, loads 3 times faster than apps, no monthly fees. Minimalist look, 15+ options to customize.
pageContext.description:
Selling age restricted products on your website? Ensure your visitors verify their age as soon as they land on your Shopify store.

Minimalist, lightweight and clean look to fit any theme. No need to pay monthly fees for an app. Have it coded once into your theme. Besides saving you money it also improves performance since there are no external content being loaded.

No coding knowledge required. Code snippet coded by a certified Shopify Partner.

One image is worth a thousand words, but one live preview's worthiness is beyond evaluation! So check this plugin working live clicking here:

→ Live Demo ←

Password: 123

What you'll get:


This plugin automatically adds an age verification popup into your theme and, in addition, gives you some options to customize at the customize page of your theme.


Here are all the main features:

- Enable or disable the popup

- Customize the wording of the title, subtitle, "accept" button, "deny" button
- Customize the link to redirect the user if they are underage (defaults to "google.com")

- Customize the font size for the title, subtitle, "accept" button and "deny" button. You can choose different sizes for both mobile and desktop.

- Customize color for text, buttons and background.

- Life time free bug fixes

- Constantly maintained and improved



Installation:


Installation takes less than 5 minutes.


You just need to copy and paste the files received upon download.


Detailed instructions can be found here.


Support:


We give 100% support to all of its users to ensure that what you're seeing on the demo page is exactly what you see on your website, same day responses are guaranteed.


If you have any questions, troubles or find bugs just reach out to us:


ezfycode@gmail.com

FAQ:

Q: I'd like to add certain features that are not included. Can you do it?
A: Yes, absolutely! Kindly contact us before purchase so we can quote you how much it would be. Additional custom coding is not included in the price of this product.

Q: What is included in the support?

A: We ensure that whatever you see on the demo page is what appears on your own website. In addition, any bugs you find will be promptly investigated and fixed.


Q: Do you offer refunds?

A: Taking into consideration that it's a digital product with a live demo we do not offer refunds. However we do guarantee this will work on any Shopify theme.


If you have any unanswered questions please feel free to reach out to us before making your purchase, we'll be happy to help.


Thank you!

relatedProducts.title: Responsive Banner Section (PRO)
relatedProducts.miniDescription: Banner Section that allows you to use an image for mobile devices and, optionally, a different one on desktop.
relatedProducts.description:
This is a responsive banner section for Shopify coded by a certified Shopify partner.



What you'll get:



It works out of the box with any theme with sections. It allows you to:


✔️ Lazyload to improve performance

✔️ Images are preloaded to avoid CLS issues on your Google score

✔️ Add a link to redirect on click

✔️ Open link on new tab or same page

✔️ Use an image for desktop and a different one for mobile devices

✔️ Controllable top margin/spacing

✔️ Controllable top margin/spacing

✔️ Works on every single theme

✔️ Lifetime free updates


Installation:


Installation takes 30 seconds. You can find detailed instructions clicking here.


You just need to copy/paste the file that comes in this download.


Support:


We give 100% support to all of its users to ensure that what you're seeing on the demo page is exactly what you see on your website, same day responses are guaranteed.


If you have any questions, troubles or find bugs just reach out to me:


ezfycode@gmail.com


Thank you!

relatedProducts.title: Slideshow Section (PRO)
relatedProducts.miniDescription: Premium slideshow section. More than 50 customization options. Works on any theme, no apps required.
relatedProducts.description:
The Slideshow Section (PRO) is a code snippet that adds a gorgeous slideshow section to your theme. Carefully crafted by certified Shopify Partners with a decade of experience.

Before releasing this product, thanks to our willing Shopify Plus clients, we have tested and perfected this Slideshow for months using real stores with thousands of daily visitors to ensure maximum quality and efficiency.

No apps.
Works on any theme. (paid, free or custom made.)
Loads faster than any app.

→ Live Demo ←


What you'll get:


This code works out of the box with any theme using sections.


At the customize page you'll be able to change options to your liking, such as:


- Multiple height options: set an unique height for desktop and mobile devices



- Parallax: keep the image still when scrolling



- Autoplay: automatically goes to the next image every X seconds. You can choose any value from 3 to 20 seconds.
- Navigation: Choose between dots, bars or none. (none, dots, bars). Colors are fully customizable for both bars and dots, plus you can customize the dots' size. (the bars' size can not be customized).



- Arrows: show arrows on desktop and/or on mobile devices. Size and colors fully customizable.



- Text animations: enable or disable text animations when changing from slide to slide.
- Image: use any image for desktop and, optionally, a different one for mobile. Control the focal point of each image to ensure the subject of your photo is visible.



- Lazyload: the section loads only images that are visible to improve performance
- Text: control all text, font sizes, set unique values for desktop & mobile. Absolute freedom



- Text alignment: control where to align your text (left, center, right, bottom left, bottom center & bottom right). You can set individual options for each slide. The first slide can have its text aligned to the left and the second to the right, for example.



- Buttons: add up to two buttons for each slide. Full ability to customize the link, text, text color, border color background color and font size



- Text shadow: add a shadow behind the text to improve readability. Customizable color and intensity
- Image overlay: darken images to improve readability. Customizable color and intensity
- Image change animation: choose between fade or slide
- Use as many sections as you wish on a single page
- Fully compatible with Online Store 2.0
- Make the Slideshow match any theme's design with multiple color & size control options


Installation:


Installation takes 30 seconds. Please find detailed instructions clicking here.


Support:


We give 100% support to all of its users to ensure that what you're seeing on the demo page is exactly what you see on your website, same day responses are guaranteed.


If you have any questions, troubles or find bugs just reach out to us at:


ezfycode@gmail.com


FAQ:


Question: Does it work with videos?

Answer: No, the Slideshow Section (PRO) does not work with videos.

Q. I need custom coding in this slideshow. Can you do it?
A. Yes, we do offer custom coding as an additional service, it is not included in the price of the slideshow. Please email us with your website URL and further details for a more accurate quote.

Q: What is included in the support?

A: We ensure that whatever you see on the demo page is what appears on your own website. In addition, any bugs will be promptly investigated and fixed.


Q: Do you offer refunds?

A: Taking into consideration that it's a digital product with a live demo we do not offer refunds. However we do guarantee the slideshow will work on any theme with sections.


Thank you!
